Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tooltips, fullscreen auto-hide controls, and double-click toggle

Features:
- Add tooltips to all icon buttons across the app for better UX
- Fullscreen video controls auto-hide after 3 seconds of inactivity
- Single tap on video shows controls, double-tap toggles fullscreen
- Fix video controls \(Fit/Fullscreen\) not visible in normal mode
  by moving them above MediaElement layer \(ZIndex 20\)
- Controls dynamically positioned for desktop/mobile layouts

Files with tooltips:
- PlaybackControls, MiniPlayerBar, PlayerPage, CarModePage
- QueuePage, LibraryPage, EqualizerPage, SearchPage, LyricsPage

EOF
